vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Midianites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.4;
son of: Midian (H4080);
brother of: Ephah (H5891), Epher (H6081), Hanoch (H2585I) and Eldaah (H0420)
§ Abida or Abidah = "my father knows"
fourth son of Midian and grandson of Abraham by his wife Keturah (after Sarah died)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Madián, hijo de Queturá, mujer de Abraham
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞比大 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我父知道"
米甸第四個兒子，亞伯拉罕和基土拉 (原配撒拉去世後所娶的妻子) 之系所出的孫子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚比大 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我父知道"
米甸第四个儿子，亚伯拉罕和基土拉 (原配撒拉去世后所娶的妻子) 之系所出的孙子
